topic.author: Kristine Jonina
topic.title: Covid-19 Pandemic
topic.description: How has the COVID-19 pandemic changed the world?
topic.narrative: A relevant document should summarize the economic, social, and health impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic worldwide. It should also address the measures taken to combat the virus and the long-term changes in daily life. Documents that focus on another pandemic or only on medical details without reference to societal changes are less relevant.

topic.author: Kristine Jonina
topic.title: Current Fashion Trends
topic.description: What are the current fashion trends for this season?
topic.narrative: A relevant document should name clothing items and combinations that are trending in the current season. Trends from past seasons or years are not relevant, nor is the historical origin of these trends. Gender is irrelevant, the clothes can be for both women and men.
